label: See
prompt: Name 5 things you can see around you.

label: Feel
prompt: Name 4 things you can feel with your body (e.g. chair, clothes, air).

label: Hear
prompt: Name 3 things you can hear (near or far).

label: Smell
prompt: Name 2 things you can smell right now.

label: Taste
prompt: Name 1 thing you can taste (or remember the taste of).
